about.title: About Mirbazar
about.subtitle: A platform that gathers discounts and promotions from all stores in Uzbekistan
about.mission_text: Mirbazar was created to help shoppers in Uzbekistan find the best prices. We track discounts from dozens of stores every day and present them to users in a convenient format. Our goal is to make finding the best deals easier for every shopper.
about.step1_text: Our system automatically monitors discount announcements from stores' official Telegram channels.
about.step2_text: Using artificial intelligence, discount percentages, product types, and expiration dates are extracted.
about.step3_text: All discounts are organized by categories and stores, making search easier.
about.step4_text: Discounts are delivered to users via website, Telegram channel, and Instagram.
about.stores_text: We currently track discounts from the following stores:
about.cta_text: Subscribe to our Telegram channel and stay updated on the best deals

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: For questions, suggestions, or partnerships, get in touch with us
contact.telegram_bot_desc: Main contact channel. Get quick answers to your questions.
contact.telegram_channel_desc: Daily discounts and promotions. Subscribe, don't miss out.
contact.instagram_desc: Official discounts page. Beautiful posts and stories.
contact.email_desc: For official correspondence and partnership proposals.
contact.faq1_q: Where does the discount information come from?
contact.faq1_a: All information is automatically collected from stores' official Telegram channels and processed using artificial intelligence.
contact.faq2_a: Yes, Mirbazar.uz is a completely free service. You can view all discounts on the website, Telegram, and Instagram for free.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1_text: Mirbazar.uz is a service that aggregates discounts from stores in Uzbekistan. We respect our users' privacy and strive to protect personal data. This policy explains what data is collected on our site and how it is used.
privacy.s2_intro: The following data may be automatically collected when using our site:
privacy.s2_item1: IP address and general technical information about the device
privacy.s2_item3: Browser type and operating system information
privacy.s2_item4: Data collected through cookies and similar technologies
privacy.s3_text: We use Google Analytics to analyze site traffic. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect anonymous statistical data about how users use the site. This data is used to improve the site. For more information, see Google's privacy policy.
privacy.s4_text: Our site may display advertisements through Google AdSense. Google AdSense uses cookies to show users advertisements relevant to their interests. You can manage Google ad personalization settings on the
privacy.s5_intro: Our site uses cookies for the following purposes:
privacy.s5_analytics_desc: collecting site statistics via Google Analytics
privacy.s6_text: We do not sell or share users' personal data with third parties (except where required by law). All collected data is stored on secure servers and protected from unauthorized access.
privacy.s7_item3: Manage cookies in your browser settings
privacy.s8_text: If you have questions about the privacy policy, contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.s1_text: By using the Mirbazar.uz website, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the site. Mirbazar.uz is a service that aggregates discounts and promotions from stores in Uzbekistan.
terms.s2_item1: Information about current discounts and promotions from stores
terms.s2_item2: Filtering discounts by categories and stores
terms.s2_item3: Sending discount notifications via Telegram and Instagram
terms.s3_intro: Mirbazar.uz serves only as an information source. We are not responsible for:
terms.s3_item1: Accuracy and timeliness of discount information (data comes from stores)
terms.s3_item3: Content on third-party sites and services
terms.s3_item4: Damages resulting from users' purchasing decisions
terms.s4_text: All content on the site — design, logo, texts, and software — belongs to the Mirbazar.uz team. Store names and logos belong to their respective owners. Unauthorized copying, distributing, or reusing site content is prohibited.
terms.s5_intro: The following is prohibited when using the site:
terms.s5_item1: Actions harmful to site operation (DDoS, hacking, etc.)
terms.s5_item2: Overloading the site through automated systems
terms.s5_item3: Spreading false information or causing harm to other users
terms.s6_text: Our site contains links to stores' official websites, Telegram channels, and other external resources. We are not responsible for the content or privacy policies of third-party sites. We recommend reading their terms before using them.
terms.s7_text: We reserve the right to change these terms of service at any time. Changes take effect when published on the site. Continued use of the site means you agree to the updated terms.
terms.s8_text: If you have questions about the terms of service, contact us:

footer.description: All discounts in Uzbekistan in one place. Daily updates, best prices.

cookie.text: We use cookies to improve site performance and display advertisements.
